Ok, Prodigy:

1. this is a battle. You have to let others reply before you do too 
much. Flying that far is too much.

2. There are both a shot limit and a power limit. From what I 
understand of your Terror Force, and if I properly know what the 
number 6 means, which I think I do, your post would be breaking those 
rules too, unless Angel Prime is so drained after using the Terror 
Force that he can hardly move, and those fireballs do relitively 
little damage.

So please repost and post damage for all the shots. Thanx.
